=Event-driven Response Tables=

|| || <b>Event</b> || <b>System State</b> || <b>Response</b> ||
|| E1 || User clicks the new game button || System is at the main screen || 1. All appropriate global variables are initialized. <br> 2. HUD is displayed.||
|| E2 || User clicks the load game button || System is at the main screen || 1. Saved game data is loaded and game resumes. <br> 2. HUD is displayed.||
|| E3 || User clicks the save game button || Game is in play. User is at the pause screen. || 1. System saves the current state of the game in an external file. <br> 2. HUD is displayed.||
|| E4 || User clicks the options button || System is at the main menu or pause screen. || 1. The Options page is displayed. ||
|| E5 || User clicks the quit game button || System is at the main menu or pause screen. || 1. The game ends and the window closes. ||
|| E6 || User clicks the resume game button. || Game is in play. User is at the pause screen. || 1.The game returns to the previous room. <br> 2. The game resumes ||
|| E7 || User hits the A key || Game is in play. || 1. The main character moves to the left. ||
|| E8 || User hits the S key || Game is in play. || 1. The main character moves down on the screen. ||
|| E9 || User hits the D key || Game is in play. || 1. The main character moves to the right. ||
|| E10 || User hits the W key || Game is in play. || 1. The main character moves up on the screen. ||
|| E11 || User hits the R key || Game is in play. || 1. The gun currently being held is reloaded. ||
|| E12 || User hits the P key || Game is in play. || 1. The system pauses the game and shows the upgrade screen. ||
|| E13 || User hits the P key || Game is paused.  || 1. Game is unpaused and resumes. ||
|| E14 || User hits the U key || Game is in play. || 1. The system pauses the game. <br> 2. The system shows the upgrade screen. ||
|| E15 || User moves the mouse || Game is in play. || 1. The main character rotates to face the mouse direction. ||
|| E16 || User clicks the left mouse button || Game is play. Character has ammo. Pistol is equipped. || 1. Bullet is created. <br> 2. Loaded ammo is decremented. <br> 3. Sound is played. ||
|| E17 || User clicks the left mouse button || Game is play. Character has ammo. Shotgun is equipped. || 1. Bullets are created. <br> 2. Loaded ammo is decremented. <br> 3. Sound is played.||
|| E18 || User clicks the left mouse button || Game is play. Character has ammo. Machine gun is equipped. || 1. Bullet is created. <br> 2. Loaded ammo is decremented. <br> 3. Sound is played. ||
|| E19 || User clicks the left mouse button || Game is play. Character is out of ammo. Pistol is equipped. || 1. Do nothing. <br>2. Show RELOAD alert. ||
|| E20 || User clicks the left mouse button || Game is play. Character is out of ammo. Shotgun is equipped. || 1. Do nothing. <br>2. Show RELOAD alert. ||
|| E21 || User clicks the left mouse button || Game is play. Character is out of ammo. Machine gun is equipped. || 1. Do nothing. <br>2. Show RELOAD alert. ||
|| E22 || User scrolls the mouse wheel up. || Game is in play. Pistol is current gun equipped. || 1. Do nothing. ||
|| E23 || User scrolls the mouse wheel up. || Game is in play. Shotgun is current gun equipped. || 1. Switch current gun to pistol. <br>2. Change sprite. <br>3. Sound is played. ||
|| E24 || User scrolls the mouse wheel up. || Game is in play. Machine gun is current gun equipped. || 1. Switch current gun to shotgun. <br>2. Change sprite. <br>3. Sound is played. ||
|| E25 || User scrolls the mouse wheel down. || Game is in play. Pistol is current gun equipped. || 1. Switch current gun to shotgun. <br>2. Change sprite. <br>3. Sound is played. ||
|| E26 || User scrolls the mouse wheel down. || Game is in play. Shotgun is current gun equipped. || 1. Switch current gun to machine gun. <br>2. Change sprite. <br>3. Sound is played. ||
|| E27 || User scrolls the mouse wheel down. || Game is in play. Machine gun is current gun equipped. || 1. Do nothing. ||
|| E28 || User hits any keyboard key. || Game is at main menu or pause screen. || 1. Do nothing. ||
|| E29 || Main character collides with a room transition object. || Game is in play. || 1. System changes to appropriate room specific to the object. ||
|| E30 || Main character collides with a solid object. || Game is in play.||  1. Main character is stopped by the object. ||
|| E31 || Main character collides with a movable crate. || Game is in play.|| 1. Main character is slowed and is able to push the crate. ||
|| E32 || Main character collides with an enemy. || Game is in play. || 1. Main characters health is reduced specific to the enemy type. <br> 2. Show damage aura. ||
|| E33 || Main character collides with a pistol ammo pickup. || Game is in play. Player is able to carry more pistol ammo. || 1. Pistol ammo being carried is increased by the ammo type and amount. <br> 2. Destroy pickup. ||
|| E34 || Main character collides with a shotgun ammo pickup. || Game is in play.  Player is able to carry more shotgun ammo. || 1. Shotgun ammo being carried is increased by the ammo type and amount. <br> 2. Destroy pickup. ||
|| E35 || Main character collides with a machine gun ammo pickup. || Game is in play.  Player is able to carry more machine gun ammo. || 1. Machine gun ammo being carried is increased by the ammo type and amount. <br> 2. Destroy pickup. ||
|| E36 || Main character collides with a small health pickup. || Game is in play. Players health is not full. || 1. Main characters health is increased by 20. <br> 2. Destroy pickup. ||
|| E37 || Main character collides with a large health pickup. || Game is in play. Players health is not full. || 1. Main characters health is increased 40. <br> 2. Destroy pickup. ||
|| E38 || Main character collides with a special pickup. || Game is in play. || 1. Item is added to players inventory. <br> 2. Destroy pickup. ||
|| E39 || Distance between enemy and player reaches "seen" point || Game is in play. Enemy has not been shot. || 1. Enemy starts chasing player ||
|| E40 || Distance between enemy and player exceeds "seen" point || Game is in play. Enemy has not been shot. || 1. Enemy does not chase player ||
|| E41 || Bullet collides with enemy || Game is in play. Enemy has not been shot. || 1. Enemy starts chasing player. <br> 2. Reduce enemy health. ||
|| E42 || Bullet collides with enemy || Game is in play. Enemy has been shot previously. || 1. Reduce enemy health. ||				
|| E43 || Bullet collides with a wall || Game is in play. || 1. Destroy the bullet instance. ||					
|| E44 || Bullet collides with a breakable crate || Game is in play. || 1. Reduce the crates health. ||				
|| E45 || Zombie collides with a breakable crate || Game is in play. || 1. Reduce the crates health. ||				
|| E46 || The pistol runs out of ammo || Game is in play. Current gun is pistol || 1. The system starts the reload script to reload the pistol. ||			
|| E47 || The shotgun runs out of ammo || Game is in play. Current gun is shotgun || 1. The system starts the reload script to reload the shotgun. ||
|| E48 || The machine gun runs out of ammo || Game is in play. Current gun is machine gun. || 1. The system starts the reload script to reload the machine gun. ||
|| E49 || The enemy runs out of health || Game is in play. || 1. Stop the enemy. <br> 2. Change instance to 'blood pool' object. <br> 3. Create blood emitter. ||
|| E50 || The breakable crate runs out of health || Game is in play. || 1. Destroy the crate instance. <br> 2. Create random pickup. ||				
|| E51 || The main character runs out of health || Game is in play. || 1. Initiate death animation. <br> 2. Play sound. Show game over screen. ||				
|| E52 || A crate collides with a wall || Game is in play. || 1. Stop the crate from moving towards the wall. ||
